name: John Doe
summary:
**Summary:**
John Doe is a highly qualified candidate with a Master of Business Administration specializing in Strategy and Data Analytics from INSEAD and a Bachelor of Science in Computer Science with a focus on Applied Mathematics and Artificial Intelligence from University College London. With nearly 10 years of experience, including roles as a Senior Data & AI Strategist at Infosys and Head of Data & Analytics at TechCorp Solutions, John possesses a strong technical skill set in areas such as Machine Learning, Cloud-native data estates, Applied Mathematics, and Data Pipelines. His soft skills include Change management, Business transformation, P&L management, Strategy execution, and Leadership.

**Evaluation:**
John Doe's experience and skills align well with the job description for a Data & AI Strategist at Infosys. He has the technical skills in Programming, Applied Mathematics, and Modern data engineering technologies, as well as the soft skills in Business Empathy, Networking, Leadership, and Communication that are required for the role. Additionally, his experience in leading strategic initiatives and engaging with clients makes him a strong candidate for this position.

**Recommendation:**
I recommend offering the job of Data & AI Strategist at Infosys to John Doe. His educational background, work experience, technical skills, and soft skills make him a suitable candidate to lead data and AI strategy initiatives, engage with clients, and represent Infosys in public forums. John's track record in strategic leadership roles and his ability to drive business transformation using data and AI align well with the job requirements.

Given John's qualifications and experience, he is well-suited for a senior-level role such as the Data & AI Strategist position.

name: Antonio Ochotorena
summary:
**Summary:**
Antonio Ochotorena holds a Master's degree and Bachelor's degree in Biomedical Engineering from Universidad Politécnica de Madrid. With nearly 4 years of experience, including roles as a Strategy Business Consultant at MINSAIT and in data science at Hospital Ramon y Cajal, Antonio possesses a diverse technical skill set encompassing tools like Tableau, Python, Java, and more. He also demonstrates essential soft skills such as self-sufficiency, attention to detail, and communication.

**Evaluation:**
Antonio's background in Biomedical Engineering, coupled with his experience in strategy consulting and data science, aligns well with the technical and soft skills required for the Data & AI Strategist role at Infosys. His expertise in Python, Tableau, and data analysis tools, along with his demonstrated leadership abilities, make him a strong candidate for this position.

**Recommendation:**
I recommend considering Antonio Ochotorena for the Data & AI Strategist role at Infosys. His educational background, work experience, technical skills, and soft skills make him a suitable candidate to lead strategic master plans and advisory engagements in data and AI initiatives. Antonio's blend of technical proficiency and strategic acumen positions him as a valuable asset for driving business transformation through data and AI at Infosys.

By leveraging his experience in strategy consulting and data science, Antonio can contribute significantly to Infosys' mission and excel in guiding clients through transformative data and AI-led initiatives.
